s_title: Lufia II - Rise of the Sinistrals
s_synopsis: "Lufia II - Rise of the Sinistrals" is a prequel to "Lufia & the Fortress of Doom". Its events take place ninety-nine years prior to it, and it explains the origin of the series' antagonists, the group of super-humans known as the Sinistrals. The player controls the ancestor of the first game's protagonist, the swordsman Maxim. After having encountered a mysterious woman named Iris, Maxim goes on a journey to find other heroes who would help him to stop the Sinistrals from destroying the world.
